column1: Kata Robata////Uni Chawanmushi - It tasted particular
column2: to say the least. I liked the fluffiness of the egg custard. It did have some overpowering fishy smell to it but it's understandable cause they made it with real japanese uni
column3: another reason they spiked up the price of $9 to $12 or so. But I didn't like the fact that they didn't tell us of the price change until after we got our checks and I asked about it.
